title: Serif in book cover
content:
Can someone name that font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170419im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_570xN_4879.480621061_q8ee.jpg)

Font: 

 Clearface ITC 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170419/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [il\_570xN.480621061\_q8ee.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170419/http:/typophile.com/files/il_570xN.480621061_q8ee.jpg) | 59.11 KB |
author: Phillip Rodolfi

comments.content: It looks like **[Clearface (Heavy)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170419/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Clearface%20ITC%20BQ%20-%20Heavy&fid=7f6218d6e719daf54d7de9c90f1440b3&fsize=60&text=The%20kany-kolored%20Tom%20Wolfe&wrap=2)** by Victor Caruso [1978]
